summary: Research completed for Neovim WezTerm task number integration. Current hook implementation may already work - requires testing. Identified three approaches if needed: (A) Neovim terminal input monitoring, (B) Enhanced hook with Neovim-side OSC emission, (C) coder/claudecode.nvim migration. Recommended approach is to test existing implementation first.

artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing current wezterm-task-number.sh hook, Neovim Claude Code integration patterns, and three implementation approaches for extending task number display to Neovim-embedded Claude Code
